Buttons Buttons are styled links that can lead to local page or external link. Example {{< button relref="/" [class="..."] >}}Get Home{{< /button >}} {{< button href="https://github.com/alex-shpak/hugo-book" >}}Contribute{{< /button >}} Get Home Contribute

Columns Columns help organize shorter pieces of content horizontally for readability. {{< columns >}} <!-- begin columns block --> # Left Content Lorem markdownum insigne... <---> <!-- magic sparator, between columns --> # Mid Content Lorem markdownum insigne... <---> <!-- magic sparator, between columns --> # Right Content Lorem markdownum insigne... {{< /columns >}} Example Left Content Lorem markdownum insigne. Olympo signis Delphis! Retexi Nereius nova develat stringit, frustra Saturnius uteroque inter!

Details Details shortcode is a helper for details html5 element. It is going to replace expand shortcode. Example {{< details "Title" [open] >}} ## Markdown content Lorem markdownum insigne... {{< /details >}} {{< details title="Title" open=true >}} ## Markdown content Lorem markdownum insigne... {{< /details >}} Title Markdown content Lorem markdownum insigne…

Expand Expand shortcode can help to decrease clutter on screen by hiding part of text. Expand content by clicking on it. Example Default {{< expand >}} ## Markdown content Lorem markdownum insigne... {{< /expand >}} Expand â†• Markdown content Lorem markdownum insigne… With Custom Label {{< expand "Custom Label" "..." >}} ## Markdown content Lorem markdownum insigne... {{< /expand >}} Custom Label .

Hints Hint shortcode can be used as hint/alerts/notification block. There are 3 colors to choose: info, warning and danger. {{< hint [info|warning|danger] >}} **Markdown content** Lorem markdownum insigne. Olympo signis Delphis! Retexi Nereius nova develat stringit, frustra Saturnius uteroque inter! Oculis non ritibus Telethusa {{< /hint >}} Example Markdown content Lorem markdownum insigne. Olympo signis Delphis! KaTeX KaTeX shortcode let you render math typesetting in markdown document. See KaTeX Example {{< katex [display] [class="text-center"] >}} f(x) = \int_{-\infty}^\infty\hat f(\xi)\,e^{2 \pi i \xi x}\,d\xi {{< /katex >}} \[ f(x) = \int_{-\infty}^\infty\hat f(\xi)\,e^{2 \pi i \xi x}\,d\xi \] Display Mode Example Here is some inline example: \(\pi(x)\) , rendered in the same line. And below is display example, having display: block \[ f(x) = \int_{-\infty}^\infty\hat f(\xi)\,e^{2 \pi i \xi x}\,d\xi \] Text continues here.

Mermaid Chart Mermaid is library for generating svg charts and diagrams from text. Example {{< mermaid [class="text-center"]>}} sequenceDiagram Alice->>Bob: Hello Bob, how are you? alt is sick Bob->>Alice: Not so good :( else is well Bob->>Alice: Feeling fresh like a daisy end opt Extra response Bob->>Alice: Thanks for asking end {{< /mermaid >}} mermaid.initialize({ flowchart: { useMaxWidth:true } }); sequenceDiagram Alice-Bob: Hello Bob, how are you?

Tabs Tabs let you organize content by context, for example installation instructions for each supported platform. {{< tabs "uniqueid" >}} {{< tab "MacOS" >}} # MacOS Content {{< /tab >}} {{< tab "Linux" >}} # Linux Content {{< /tab >}} {{< tab "Windows" >}} # Windows Content {{< /tab >}} {{< /tabs >}} Example MacOS MacOS This is tab MacOS content. item.title: Objectifs

item.title: RÃ©ponses pour le SÃ©ance 1
item.description: RÃ©ponses pour le SÃ©ance 1 RÃ©ponse Cas 1 Scan non-contraste: On note des changements ischÃ©mique prÃ©coce (Figure 1) impliquant les noyaux centraux gris droits (spÃ©cifiquement la tÃªte caudÃ©e et le putamen), rÃ©sultant en un score d’ASPECT de 8. Il existe Ã©galement une MCA droite hyperdense (Figure 2). Il n’y a pas de contra-indication pour la thrombolyse. En ce qui concerne les lÃ©sions chroniques, il y a quelques petits lacunes comme dans le centrum semiovale droit (Figure 3).

Il n’y a pas d’occlusion extra-crÃ¢nienne. RÃ©ponse Cas 2 Scan non-contraste: Il y a une petite zone subtile de changement ischÃ¨mique precoce impliquant l’aspect latÃ©ral des gyri central prÃ© et post (Figure 1).

item.title: ThÃ©orie
item.description: Notions thÃ©oriques Lâ€™imagerie de lâ€™AVC aigu Dans un premier temps, un scan cÃ©rÃ©bral sans contraste endoveineux est effectuÃ© pour : Exclure une cause hÃ©morragique Identifier une Ã©tiologie alternative DÃ©tecter des changements ischÃ©miques prÃ©coces Estimer lâ€™Ã©tendue du territoire atteint par lâ€™ischÃ©mie Si aucune cause non-ischÃ©mique nâ€™est identifiÃ©e ou quâ€™il y a des changements ischÃ©miques prÃ©coces, la poursuite de lâ€™investigation avec un angioscan cÃ©rÃ©bral a pour objectif dâ€™identifier un site dâ€™occlusion.
